member.name: P:EamonRT.Framework.Components.ICombatComponent.MemberNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets which member of ActorMonster's group is attacking (always 1 for single Monsters).

member.name: P:EamonRT.Framework.Components.ICombatComponent.AttackNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets which attack number the ActorMonster's group member is performing (may be >= 1 based on AttackCount).

member.name: P:EamonRT.Framework.Components.ICombatComponent.BlastSpell
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this CombatComponent was created to inflict Blast spell damage.

member.name: P:EamonRT.Framework.Components.ICombatComponent.MaxDamage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this CombatComponent always calculates initial damage done to be the maximum allowed.
member.remarks: When this is true initial damage done is set to (D*S) where D=Dice and S=Sides.

member.name: P:EamonRT.Framework.Components.ICombatComponent.OmitArmor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether DobjMonster's armor should be omitted from damage calculations.

member.name: P:EamonRT.Framework.Components.ICombatComponent.OmitMonsterStatus
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this CombatComponent should omit printing DobjMonster's health status after damage is calculated.

member.name: P:EamonRT.Framework.Components.IComponentSignatures.SetNextStateFunc
member.summary: Gets or sets the function used to set the NextState property of the Eamon CS game engine's current State or Command.

member.name: P:EamonRT.Framework.Components.IComponentSignatures.CopyCommandDataFunc
member.summary: Gets or sets the function used to copy the data of the Eamon CS game engine's current Command.

member.name: P:EamonRT.Framework.Components.IComponentSignatures.OmitSkillGains
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this Component should omit skill gains if the player character's action is successful.

member.name: P:EamonRT.Framework.Components.IComponentSignatures.OmitFinalNewLine
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this Component should print a final newline after processing completes.

member.name: P:EamonRT.Framework.Plugin.IEngine.StartRoom
member.summary: Gets or sets the Room Uid of the player character's initial location at the beginning of the game.

member.name: P:EamonRT.Framework.Plugin.IEngine.NumSaveSlots
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of Saved Game slots available for use in the game.

member.name: M:EamonRT.Framework.Plugin.IEngine.GetImportedPlayerInventory
member.summary: Gets the original carried/worn inventory brought by the player into the game.

member.name: M:EamonRT.Framework.Plugin.IEngine.HideImportedPlayerInventory
member.summary: Hides the original carried/worn inventory brought by the player into the game by moving each Artifact into Limbo.
member.remarks: This method is intended to be used with RestoreImportedPlayerInventory to hide the player's inventory when entering the game and then restore it again prior to exiting the game. It should only be used in MainLoop.Startup.

member.name: M:EamonRT.Framework.Plugin.IEngine.RestoreImportedPlayerInventory
member.summary: Restores the original carried/worn inventory brought by the player into the game by moving each Artifact back to its initial location.
member.remarks: This method is intended to be used with HideImportedPlayerInventory to hide the player's inventory when entering the game and then restore it again prior to exiting the game. It should only be used in MainLoop.Shutdown.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterEndRound
member.summary: An event that fires at the end of the current round, after all processing is done.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforeStartRound
member.summary: An event that fires at the start of a new round, before any processing is done.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterExtinguishLightSourceCheck
member.summary: An event that fires after the player moves to a new Room, and any carried light source is extinguished (if necessary).

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterMoveMonsters
member.summary: An event that fires after the player moves to a new Room, and any Monsters in the exited Room (friendly or hostile) have followed.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterSetDestinationRoom
member.summary: An event that fires after the player's destination Room Uid is calculated and stored.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforePrintCommandPrompt
member.summary: An event that fires before the player's command prompt is printed.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforeCanMoveToRoomCheck
member.summary: An event that fires before it is known whether the player can move to a Room.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterBlockingArtifactCheck
member.summary: An event that fires after it is known whether a blocking Artifact (for example, a door) prevents the player's movement.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforePrintPlayerRoom
member.summary: An event that fires before the player's Room is printed.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterPrintPlayerRoom
member.summary: An event that fires after the player's Room is printed.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterClearLastCommandList
member.summary: An event that fires after the player's command is processed (but not executed) and the LastCommandList cleared.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterAggravateMonster
member.summary: An event that fires after a Monster targeted by an attack gets aggravated.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforeGuardMonsterCheck
member.summary: An event that fires before a guard Monster prevents a bound Monster from being freed.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforeKeyArtifactCheck
member.summary: An event that fires before a key Artifact prevents a bound Monster from being freed.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterEnforceMonsterWeightLimitsCheck
member.summary: An event that fires after limits are enforced on the weight a Monster can carry.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterGiveReadiedWeaponCheck
member.summary: An event that fires after checking if a readied weapon is given away.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforeTakePlayerGold
member.summary: An event that fires before a Monster takes the gold offered by the player.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterCloseArtifact
member.summary: An event that fires after an Artifact is closed.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforeDrinkArtifact
member.summary: An event that fires before an Artifact is drunk.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforeNowEmptyArtifactCheck
member.summary: An event that fires before checking if an Artifact is fully drunk.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterDrinkArtifact
member.summary: An event that fires after an Artifact is drunk.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforeEatArtifact
member.summary: An event that fires before an Artifact is eaten.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterEatArtifact
member.summary: An event that fires after an Artifact is eaten.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterPrintArtifactFullDesc
member.summary: An event that fires after an Artifact's full description is printed (but before units are listed for drinkables/edibles).

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterPrintArtifactContents
member.summary: An event that fires after an Artifact's container contents are printed.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforePrintArtifactOpen
member.summary: An event that fires after an Artifact is opened but before the open message is printed.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterOpenArtifact
member.summary: An event that fires after an Artifact is opened.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforePutArtifact
member.summary: An event that fires before an Artifact is put into a container.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterPutArtifact
member.summary: An event that fires after an Artifact is put into a container.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforePrintArtifactReadText
member.summary: An event that fires before an Artifact's read text is printed.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterReadArtifact
member.summary: An event that fires after an Artifact is read.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterRemoveWornArtifact
member.summary: An event that fires after a worn Artifact is removed.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforeUseArtifact
member.summary: An event that fires before an Artifact is used.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterWearArtifact
member.summary: An event that fires after an Artifact is worn.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforePrintSayText
member.summary: An event that fires before spoken text is printed.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterPrintSayText
member.summary: An event that fires after spoken text is printed.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterPrintPlayerStatus
member.summary: An event that fires after the player's status text is printed.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterNumberOfExitsCheck
member.summary: An event that fires after checking if exits are available for fleeing, and it resolves that there are.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforeReadyArtifact
member.summary: An event that fires before an Artifact is readied.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterReadyArtifact
member.summary: An event that fires after an Artifact is readied.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforeAttackMonster
member.summary: An event that fires before a Monster is attacked or blasted.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforeAttackArtifact
member.summary: An event that fires before an Artifact is attacked or blasted.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforeExamineMonsterHealthStatus
member.summary: An event that fires before a Monster's health status is examined.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterExamineMonsterHealthStatus
member.summary: An event that fires after a Monster's health status is examined.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.BeforeInventoryMonsterHealthStatus
member.summary: An event that fires before a Monster's health status is inventoried.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterInventoryMonsterHealthStatus
member.summary: An event that fires after a Monster's health status is inventoried.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterAttackNonEnemyCheck
member.summary: An event that fires after checking if a non-enemy Monster should be attacked.

member.name: F:EamonRT.Framework.Primitive.Enums.EventType.AfterRefuseDeadBodyCheck
member.summary: An event that fires after checking if a Monster should refuse to accept a dead body gift.

member.name: M:EamonRT.Game.Plugin.Engine.ScaledValueMinMaxEncode(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Encode an 6-digit number where the high 3 digits are the maxValue and the low 3 digits are the minValue

member.name: M:EamonRT.Game.Plugin.Engine.ScaledValueMinMaxDecode(System.Int64,System.Int64@,System.Int64@)
